effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Thunder to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.effect: Teaches Thunder to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
激しい　雷を
相手に　落として　攻撃する。
まひ状態に　することが　ある。

A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on
the target to inflict damage. This may
also leave the target with paralysis.

Il nemico è colpito da un lampo molto violento
che può anche paralizzarlo.

Movimiento de ataque que dobla su potencia si
quien lo utiliza está envenenado, quemado o
paralizado.

Das Ziel wird von einem mächtigen Donnerschlag,
der Paralyse bewirken kann, heimgesucht.

La foudre tombe sur l’ennemi pour lui infliger
des dégâts. Peut aussi le paralyser.

강한 번개를
상대에게 떨어뜨려 공격한다.
마비 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

はげしい　かみなりを　おとして
こうげきする。　あいてを　まひの
じょうたいに　することが　ある。

A wicked thunderbolt is dropped
on the target to inflict damage. It may
also leave the target with paralysis.

on the target to inflict damage. It may
also leave the target with paralysis.

La foudre tombe sur l’ennemi pour
lui infliger des dégâts. Peut aussi
le paralyser.

A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the
foe to inflict damage. It may also
leave the target paralyzed.

A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the
foe to inflict damage. It may also
leave the target paralyzed.

A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the
foe to inflict damage. It may also
leave the target paralyzed.

A brutal lightning
attack that may
also leave the foe
paralyzed.

Strikes the foe
with a thunderbolt.
It may paralyze.

with a thunderbolt.
It may paralyze.
